name: unimpressive
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not making you feel admiration or respect: Improvement was needed after the team's unimpressive start to the season. Despite its promises, this government's record is unimpressive. See
unimpressed
More examplesFewer examplesThe coach has told fans not to be alarmed by his side's unimpressive performances. He was an unimpressive witness, more concerned with making an impression than answering questions.An unimpressive figure, he was part of the disastrous 2017 election team.
